resources.string:
MANITWoSAFETY APP as name suggest it is made for protection of women within as well as outside of MANIT campus."
" This app is meant for all women (Students,Teachers,SBI bank employee ,......)."
" There is an initiative by Bhopal police for helping women."
" A whatsApp number is provided by them for helping women."
" whatsApp no - 07049106300 "
" We recommend to add this number in your emergency contacts mostly who live outside the campus (Students,Teachers,SBI employee…) "
"

- Save your Emergency contacts. "
" - You can change your Saved contacts anytime. "
" - Please select one sim for sending message always(very important)."
" - Always keep your location on ."
" - Press power button four times (in a row) in emergency."
" - You will hear a Beep,when your app starts sending messages. "
" - You will hear long warning audio if location(GPS) is not enabled on your phone."
" - Messages(containing your current location on google map ) are send to your emergency contacts(in interval of 4 minutes) till you close the app."
" - You can use Trial option for testing your phone compatibility."
" - A fake number is used in Trial option not Saved contacts.

There is an initiative by Bhopal police for helping women."
" A whatsApp number is provided by them for helping women."
" whatsApp no - 07049106300 "
" We recommend to add this number in your emergency contacts mostly who live outside the campus (Students,Teachers,SBI employee…) "
"
PRESS POWER BUTTON FOUR TIMES IN EMERGENCY(IN A ROW) OR PRESS BUTTON BELOW
